entry.lex: GMA New Media, led by Felipe Gozon, is a mobile app creating media company. Established on New Years Day of the new millennium, the company provides Internet services. Philippine Entertainment Portal and Digify Inc are just two of the company’s subsidiaries.

GMA New Media is a media company that creates mobile apps and produces services for the web. Primarily led by Felipe Gozon, the company was created on January 1, 2000. Two of their subsidiaries include Philippine Entertainment Portal, Inc and Digify Inc.

GMA New Media, founded in January, 2000, is a media company which make websites and offers mobile application products. Its chairman and CEO is Felipe Gozon. GMA New Media subsidiaries include Philippine Entertainment Portal and Digify, Inc.

Mantecorp is a subsidiary of Hypermarcas, located in Sao Paulo, which is a maker of healthcare products including producing pharmaceutical drugs. Hypermarcas employs 10,252 people, has a net income of $108,600,000, and their revenue is $1,800,000,000.

Hypermarcas is primarily a drug company, which also sells healthcare products. They are located in Sao Paulo and employ 10,252 people. They are the owners of the subsidiary Mantecorp, and they have a net income of 108,600,000. They earn 18,000,00,000 yearly.

Hypermarcas, a producer of healthcare products and drugs, is located in São Paulo. They have a subsidary called Mantecorp. Hypermarcas employs 10,252 people and makes $1,800,000,000 a year with a net income of $108,600,000.

Trane is a subsidiary company, located in Ireland, in the city of Swords, Dublin. Tran makes building management systems and has a revenue of 10264000000 with a net income of $556,300,000. Its operating income is $875,400,000.

Trane is an Irish building management systems manufacturer is Swords, Dublin They are a subsidiary with an operating income of $875,400,000. Their revenue is $10,264,000,000, and their net income is $556,300,000.

Trane, a subsidiary that produces of building management systems, is located in Ireland - Swords, Dublin - and boasts revenues totaling 10.3 billion USD, an operating income of 875.4 million USD, and a net income of around 556 million USD.
